results.deck: F1 2011 Is a the sequel to Codemasters first F1 game, F1 2010. It features updated teams and drivers as well as the new rules of the 2011 F1 season.
results.name: F1 2011

results.deck: A port compilation including HD versions of Resident Evil 4 and Resident Evil Code: Veronica.
results.name: Resident Evil Revival Selection

results.deck: In this multiplayer-focused shooter, set in the year 1998, the evil Umbrella Corporation and the U.S. Government clash in the hellish zombie-infested remains of Raccoon City in a battle for survival and control of the truth.
results.name: Resident Evil: Operation Raccoon City

results.deck: GooseGogs was nominated for the German Developer Awards and won the prestigious German Computer Games award in 2010 and is sponsored by the sponsored by the German government.
results.name: GooseGogs

results.deck: The spiritual sequel to "Spider-Man: Shattered Dimensions", Edge of Time has the player switching between Peter Parker, the Spider-Man of Today, and Miguel O'Hara, the Spider-Man of 2099, as they try to undo the circumstances that led Peter to his untimely death.
results.name: Spider-Man: Edge of Time

results.deck: Sniper Elite V2 is a reboot to the tactical third person shooter Sniper Elite.
results.name: Sniper Elite V2

results.deck: Harley Pasternak’s Hollywood Workout is a fitness game featuring Harley Pasternak.
results.name: Harley Pasternak's Hollywood Workout

results.deck: A pet simulator for Kinect on Xbox 360, developed by THQ.  Players choose from a dog, a cat, a horse or a lizard and customise from there...
results.name: Fantastic Pets

results.deck: An upcoming Rugby game for the 2011 New Zealand Rugby World Cup. It is being developed by HB Studios.
results.name: Rugby World Cup 2011

results.deck: Capcom makes an ambitious undertaking with this 2012 Open World Action-RPG.
results.name: Dragon's Dogma

results.deck: Frank West visits Fortune City in this "what if?" retelling of Dead Rising 2.
results.name: Dead Rising 2: Off the Record

results.deck: DanceDanceRevolution is Konami's 2011 console reboot of the DDR franchise.
results.name: DanceDanceRevolution

results.deck: PowerUp Heroes is an Xbox 360-exclusive title that allows players' Avatars to fight an alien invasion using superpowers. It is slated for an October 2011 release and requires Kinect.
results.name: PowerUp Heroes

results.deck: Old school and new school collide in this 20th Anniversary celebration of the Sonic franchise.
results.name: Sonic Generations

results.deck: FIFA 12 is set to be EA Sports' 2011 iteration of the franchise, covering the 2011-2012 season and will introduce tactical defending, precision dribbling and enhanced AI.
results.name: FIFA 12

results.deck: Terraria adds upon its inspiration with a wider variety of things to create, unique enchanted items, and an overall goal of descending into Hell and defeating the sinister bosses lurking there.
results.name: Terraria

results.deck: Need for Speed: The Run has drivers racing coast to coast across the USA, speeding through a variety of environments along the way.
results.name: Need for Speed: The Run

results.deck: Assassin's Creed: Revelations is the fourth installment in the Assassin's Creed franchise and the final entry in Ezio Auditore's main storyline. A few levels also put players back in control of the original Assassin's Creed's Altair, and depict his rise to the Mentorship of the Crusades-era Brotherhood of Assassins.
results.name: Assassin's Creed: Revelations

results.deck: Named after the movie but not based on it, Kung Fu Panda 2 sees unorthodox kung-fu master Po battling sinister reptiles who seek to destroy his home village.
results.name: Kung Fu Panda 2: The Video Game

results.deck: Black Bean Games' motorcycle racing game returns for another season.
results.name: SBK: Superbike World Championship 2011

results.deck: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 brings World War 3 to the franchise, and furthers the exploits of Capt. Price and Soap MacTavish as they hunt down the international terrorist Vladimir Makarov.
results.name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3

results.deck: When Alan Wake's twisted doppelganger, Mr. Scratch, unleashes his forces of darkness throughout the rural Arizona town of Night Springs, it's up to Alan to rewrite reality and foil his plans (unaware that he has a twisted trick up his sleeve) in this crazy spin-off of the original 2010 horror game Alan Wake.
results.name: Alan Wake's American Nightmare

results.deck: Set seventeen years after Soul Calibur IV, Soul Calibur V introduces a number of new characters to the roster and offers new gameplay tweaks and online enhancements.
results.name: Soulcalibur V

results.deck: Namco Bandai continues its Dragon Ball franchise with this 2011 release. Creating the most "true to the show" Dragon Ball Z game to date.
results.name: Dragon Ball Z: Ultimate Tenkaichi

results.deck: Hasbro's popular mini-game collection series returns with this 4th iteration, which integrates motion controls and a new "game show" format inspired by the hit TV show of the same name.
results.name: Hasbro Family Game Night 4: The Game Show

results.deck: Pro Evolution Soccer 2012 is new version of very popular football simulation game from Konami.
results.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2012

results.deck: This second installment concludes TT Games' LEGO-based take on the Harry Potter heptalogy, offering more of the standard LEGO smashing, building, and collecting mayhem.
results.name: LEGO Harry Potter: Years 5-7

results.deck: Dragon Age: Inquisition is the third installment in the Dragon Age series of role-playing games developed by BioWare.
results.name: Dragon Age: Inquisition

results.deck:
Wipeout: In the Zone is a Kinect-exclusive based on the popular ABC game show, where players run, jump, and wipeout against wacky obstacles in order to score the best time.
You can play local multiplayer and view friends stats.
results.name: Wipeout: In the Zone

results.deck: The Adventures of Felix Fox: Tale of the Night is an indie game on Xbox Live Arcade.  It costs one dollar.
results.name: The Adventures of Felix Fox: Tale of the Night

results.deck: Disney Universe is an action adventure game where you wear costumes to defeat bad guys.
results.name: Disney Universe

results.deck: A Kinect-exclusive wrestling mini-game collection from Majesco.
results.name: Hulk Hogan's Main Event

results.deck: WWE '12 is the latest edition in WWE's long-running wrestling game franchise previously known as "SmackDown" and "SmackDown vs. RAW".
results.name: WWE '12

results.deck: The sequel to the underground hit Metro 2033. Set in Moscow in the year 2034, the player will be caught between warring factions vying for a doomsday device.
results.name: Metro: Last Light

results.deck: The third and final instalment in the UFC Undisputed franchise. This iteration sees the inclusion of PRIDE FC and the bantamweight and Featherweight divisions.
results.name: UFC Undisputed 3

results.deck: A compilation of several remastered Metal Gear titles: Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty, Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater, Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker, plus hundreds of VR missions and both classic MSX2 Metal Gear games.
results.name: Metal Gear Solid HD Collection

results.deck: The second and third Silent Hill games come to the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 in Silent Hill HD Collection with new high-definition graphics and voice acting.
results.name: Silent Hill HD Collection

results.deck: A compilation of both PS2 Zone of the Enders games, with updated visuals, achievements and a new opening animation for the PS3 and Xbox 360.
results.name: Zone of the Enders HD Collection

results.deck: A 2D Fighting game loosely based on characters from the visual novel Chaos;Head.
results.name: Phantom Breaker

results.deck: Pair up as Captain Kirk or Commander Spock in this co-operative based third-person shooter set after the events of the 2009 film.
results.name: Star Trek: The Video Game

results.deck: A winter sports game supporting Microsoft Kinect and Sony Move, developed by Deep Silver.
results.name: Winter Stars

results.deck: With the addition of cats and dogs for your Sims to love, The Sims 3 finally catches up to the state of the original game in 2002, when the The Sims: Unleashed expansion pack was released.
results.name: The Sims 3: Pets

results.deck: Defiance is a free-to-play MMO-shooter that coincides with events in a television series of the same name, depicting humans and aliens working together on a ravaged, mutated Earth. The game is multi-platform, but does not support cross-platform play.
results.name: Defiance

results.deck: Kinect Sports Season Two is a sequel to Rare's 2010 multi-million seller Kinect Sports, with 6 new events, full-body tracking & in-game voice control.
results.name: Kinect Sports: Season Two

results.deck: Harmonix returns to the dance floor with new features, characters, moves, and songs in this sequel to the first Dance Central on Kinect.
results.name: Dance Central 2

results.deck: The first game in the second trilogy of the Halo sci-fi series has the Master Chief awakening from cryostasis (four years after the events of the previous trilogy) as he explores the mysterious Forerunner shield world Requiem, fights a newly-formed Covenant group, and accidentally awakens an ancient evil.
results.name: Halo 4

results.deck: Fable: The Journey is a Kinect shooter that may or may not be on-rails, but it is definitely set in the Fable world of Albion.
results.name: Fable: The Journey

results.deck: Unveiled at Microsoft's 2011 E3 press conference, Kinect Disneyland Adventures features a digital recreation of many of the park's famous attractions, as well as minigames based on the rides and films that inspired them.
results.name: Kinect Disneyland Adventures

results.deck: Insomniac's first multiplatform game tells the story of OverStrike 9, a band of special-agent misfits working together to thwart a threat to mankind.
results.name: Fuse

results.deck: The sixth entry in Ubisoft's Rabbids series, and the first to utilize the Kinect add-on for Xbox 360
results.name: Rabbids: Alive & Kicking

results.deck: Just Dance 3 is Ubisoft's third main installment in the worldwide hit Just Dance series. In keeping with series tradition, despite the name obviously suggesting it, the game does not include the Lady GaGa song "Just Dance".
results.name: Just Dance 3

results.deck: The sequel to the Kinect fitness game Your Shape: Fitness Evolved.
results.name: Your Shape Fitness Evolved 2012

results.deck: A Kinect-based rail shooter for the Xbox 360 based on the controversial PMC.
results.name: Blackwater

results.deck: 2011 edition of the 2K's NBA franchise.
results.name: NBA 2K12

results.deck: The sequel to the Kinect launch game MotionSports, MotionSports: Adrenaline is an extreme sports game by Ubisoft, supporting Kinect and Move.
results.name: MotionSports Adrenaline

results.deck: Top Gun: Hard Lock is a game adaption of the famous 1980 Top Gun movie.
results.name: Top Gun: Hard Lock

results.deck: A follow-up of sorts to X-Blades, Blades of Time reintroduces minimally-dressed treasure hunter Ayumi, now with a more realistic look and the ability to record and rewind time.
results.name: Blades of Time

results.deck: "If you let go and flow with this game, you let go and flow with life. I can tell you that" - Deepak Chopra
results.name: Deepak Chopra's Leela

results.deck: Champion Jockey is the latest Tecmo/Koei horse racing release.
results.name: Champion Jockey: G1 Jockey and Gallop Racer

results.deck: A downloadable freestlye motocross game from Konami that promises high speed and big jumps.
results.name: Red Bull X-Fighters World Tour

results.deck: A fantasy Tower Defense game.
results.name: Defenders of Ardania

results.deck: The third in the series of Karaoke Revolution titles, this game covers season two of the popular tv show.
results.name: Karaoke Revolution: Glee Volume 3

results.deck: Originally announced for Japan, the game is a compilation of three best-selling and critically acclaimed Xbox Live Arcade games: Limbo, Trials HD and 'Splosion Man.
results.name: Xbox Live Hits Collection: Limbo,Trials HD and Splosion Man

results.deck: A Role Playing game in which a war between orcs, goblins and humans is told from the perspective of one of the last surviving orcs.
results.name: Of Orcs and Men

results.deck: The 2011 official video game of the world's most famous cycle race.
results.name: Tour de France 2011

results.deck: An action-adventure game about a pirate who tries to avenge the death of his family.
results.name: Vendetta: Curse of Raven's Cry

results.deck: A japanese 2D fighting game with an anime look based on the Umineko no Naku Koro ni visual novels.
results.name: Ougon Musoukyoku X

results.deck: Yet another motion controlled dancing game for the Wii, Kinect, and PS Move. Do battle with up to 8 players in 4 different game modes.
results.name: Let's Dance with Mel B

results.deck: A dating sim spin off of the original Steins;Gate.
results.name: Steins;Gate: Hiyoku Renri no Darling

results.deck: Dance to some of BEP's numerous hits in this Ubisoft dancing game.
results.name: The Black Eyed Peas Experience

results.deck: Cabela's Big Game Hunter 2012 is the latest entry in the Cabela's hunting franchise.
results.name: Cabela's Big Game Hunter 2012

results.deck: Dr. Blowhole returns again in this Kinect-focused cartoon game from THQ.
results.name: The Penguins of Madagascar: Dr. Blowhole Returns Again!

results.deck: The newest installment of the Naruto fighting games. Featuring over 70 characters from Part I & Part II.
results.name: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm Generations

results.deck: After the Empress is killed, her most loyal bodyguard, Corvo, becomes the prime suspect, and must track down those who murdered his charge and betrayed him in order to enact his bloody revenge.
results.name: Dishonored

results.deck: A new melee combat style game meant to appeal to individuals who aren't fans of WWE wrestling products. It was officially cancelled after THQ's demise in 2013.
results.name: WWE Brawl

results.deck: The key feature of upcoming product is presentation of war topics – main theme is struggle between civil insurgents of Europe and Nazi’s occupiers.   Uprising 44 will be released in IIQ of 2012 for the PC’s, MAC’s, Xbox 360 and mobile platforms.
results.name: Uprising 44

results.deck: A standalone update to Marvel vs Capcom 3 featuring new modes, characters, stages, an enhanced online experience, and large-scale rebalancing of core systems and the existing roster.
results.name: Ultimate Marvel vs. Capcom 3

results.deck: GoldenEye 007: Reloaded is a first-person shooter for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 based on the 2010 Nintendo Wii shooter GoldenEye 007, which is based on the 1997 Nintendo 64 shooter of the same name, which is based on the 1995 James Bond movie GoldenEye.
results.name: GoldenEye 007 Reloaded

results.deck: BEN 10 Galactic Racing presents the ultimate racing experience! While Ben makes use of his Ultimatrix to transform into his alien forms mid-race, every other character utilizes their unique special abilities, based on powers straight out of the television series, to affect the outcome of each race.
results.name: Ben 10: Galactic Racing

results.deck: This deliberately ridiculous third-person action game stars Juliet Starling, a zombie-slaying cheerleader who's almost as handy with a chainsaw as she is with a pair of pom-poms.
results.name: Lollipop Chainsaw

results.deck: Defy Gravity Extended is a puzzle-platformer which features gravity-altering mechanics.
results.name: Defy Gravity Extended

results.deck: Twist, stretch and shrink your body into hundreds of shapes, animals and symbols.
results.name: Take Shape

results.deck: As pilot James Logan you must survive the frigid Alaskan wilderness by any means necessary.
results.name: Cabela's Survival: Shadows of Katmai

results.deck: Nicktoons MLB features Nicktoon characters new and old facing off against actual MLB teams and players. The only game to see Powdered Toast Man hit a home run off C.C. Sabathia.
results.name: Nicktoons MLB

results.deck: Return to Pandora as part of a new group of ragtag Vault Hunters in this sequel to the 2009 first-person "role-playing shooter" Borderlands, now with new crazy enemies, new crazy character classes, and even crazier weapons.
results.name: Borderlands 2

results.deck: Port Royale 3 is the next entry in the Port Royale franchise. Like its predecessors, Port Royale 3 takes place in the 17th century, and is a pirate themed strategy game.
results.name: Port Royale 3: Pirates & Merchants

results.deck: Happy Feet Two is a video game based on the animated film of the same name. It was developed by KMM Studios and publised by WB Games.
results.name: Happy Feet Two

results.deck: Shoot your way across the solar system to level up and collect new loot in this multiplayer-focused first-person shooter from Bungie and Activision.
results.name: Destiny

results.deck: Mad Blocker Arcade is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Open Emotion Studios, which was released in 2011.
results.name: Mad Blocker Arcade

results.deck: Grand Slam Tennis' first foray into HD, this update to 2009's Grand Slam Tennis for the Wii brings with it more realistic graphics, an expanded roster and Total Racquet Control.
results.name: Grand Slam Tennis 2

results.deck: A fighting game from Konami and Arc System works, based on the manga Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan.
results.name: Nurarihyon no Mago: Hyakki Ryouran Taisen

results.deck: A third-person action RPG set in the popular tabletop role-playing universe of The Dark Eye.
results.name: The Dark Eye: Demonicon

results.deck: D3Publisher partners up with Nickolodeon to bring the Victorious television show to life.
results.name: Victorious: Time to Shine

results.deck: A reboot of the FIFA Street series, developed by the core FIFA team at EA Canada.
results.name: FIFA Street

results.deck: The first full-on expansion for The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion.
results.name: The Elder Scrolls IV: Knights of the Nine

results.deck: The latest installment in EA Sports' FIFA series, featuring updated rosters, technical improvements, a more robust feature set for Support Your Club, and a new First Touch mechanic.
results.name: FIFA Soccer 13

results.deck: Developed by Dontnod Entertainment, Remember Me is a futuristic game set in Neo-Paris. The protagonist Nilin is up against a tyrant company Memorize with the technology to manipulate peoples memory to their will. It is up to Nilin and her friends to fight against Memorize to break the bind it has on society.
results.name: Remember Me

results.deck: A role-playing camping, fishing, and hunting adventure.
results.name: Outdoors Unlimited

results.deck: The sequel to last years dance game for the kids is back. With 40 more songs but now on all three platforms.
results.name: Just Dance Kids 2

results.deck: Yet another updated version of "BlazBlue Continuum Shift", this time for the PS Vita, PS3 & Xbox 360. Features a new playable character and additional features.
results.name: BlazBlue Continuum Shift Extend
